com.orchestranetworks.ui
Class UIButtonSpec

java.lang.Object
  com.orchestranetworks.ui.UIButtonSpec
Direct Known Subclasses:
UIButtonSpecJSAction, UIButtonSpecJSActionToggle, UIButtonSpecSubmit
public abstract class UIButtonSpec
extends Object

This abstract class provides the common features of different kinds of buttons.

Since:
5.2.0

Method Detail

getButtonIcon

public final UIButtonIcon getButtonIcon()
Returns:
the icon of the button, null if it was not set.

getButtonLayout

public final UIButtonLayout getButtonLayout()
Returns:
the layout of the button, UIButtonLayout.TEXT_ONLY by default.

getConfirmationMessage

public final UserMessage getConfirmationMessage()
Returns:
the confirmation message of the button, null if it was not set.

getIconURL

public final String getIconURL()
Returns:
the URL of the button' icon, null if it was not set.

getId

public final String getId()
Returns:
the id of the button, null if it was not set.

getLabel

public final UserMessage getLabel()
Returns:
the label of the button.

getRelief

public final UIButtonRelief getRelief()
Returns:
the relief of this button.

getTooltip

public final UserMessage getTooltip()
Returns:
the tooltip of the button, null if it was not set.

hasConfirmationMessage

public final boolean hasConfirmationMessage()
Returns:
true if a confirmation message has been set, false otherwise.

isDefaultButton

public final boolean isDefaultButton()
Returns:
true if the button was set as default button, false if it was not set.

isDisabled

public final boolean isDisabled()
Returns:
true if the button was set as disabled, false if it was not set.

isExcludedFromTabFocus

public final boolean isExcludedFromTabFocus()
Returns:
true if the button was set as excluded from tab focus, false if it was not set.

setButtonIcon

public final void setButtonIcon(UIButtonIcon buttonIcon)
Sets a predefined icon to the button.

Setting a button icon will erase the icon URL.

Default value is null.

Parameters:
buttonIcon - the UIButtonLayout to set.

setButtonLayout

public final void setButtonLayout(UIButtonLayout buttonLayout)
Sets the button layout.

Default is UIButtonLayout.TEXT_ONLY.

Parameters:
buttonLayout - the UIButtonLayout to set to the button.

setConfirmationMessage

public final void setConfirmationMessage(UserMessage confirmationMessage)
Sets a message to confirm the button action. A Yes/Cancel dialog box will arise when the button will be clicked.

If the user clicks on "Cancel" in the dialog box, the action will not be called.

Parameters:
confirmationMessage - the confirmation message to set to the button.

setCssClass

public final void setCssClass(String cssClass)
Sets the additionnal CSS class(es) to the button. For multiple classes, please separate them by a space " ".

The class attribute must respect the W3C Recommendation. See http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-html40/struct/global.html#adef-class for more information.

Parameters:
cssClass - the additionnal CSS class(es) to set to the button.

setDefaultButton

public final void setDefaultButton(boolean isDefaultButton)
Enable the default mode for a button.

The default mode button can be little highlighted.

If the button is a submit button, the button must react when the ENTER key is pressed in the form. If many submit buttons are defined as default in a form, only the last must react.

Default value is false.

Parameters:
isDefaultButton - true to enable the default mode to the button, false to disable it.

setDisabled

public final void setDisabled(boolean disabled)
Sets the button to disable. A disabled button is less visible and can not be clicked or focused.

Default value is false.

The activation of a button can also be managed in JavaScript with the function UIJavaScriptWriter.addJS_setButtonDisabled(String, String).

Parameters:
disabled - true to disable the button, false to reactivate it.

setExcludedFromTabFocus

public final void setExcludedFromTabFocus(boolean excludeFromTabFocus)
Disable user to access the button with keyboard.

Default value is false.

Parameters:
excludeFromTabFocus - true to disable keyboard access, false to have default behavior.

setIconURL

public final void setIconURL(String iconURL)
Sets a custom icon to the button.

The display area of the icon is 16px height and 16px width. Into a form input field area, the size is 14px height and 14px width.

Setting an icon URL will erase the button icon.

Default value is null.

Parameters:
iconURL - the URL of the icon to set.

setId

public final void setId(String id)
Sets an id to the button.

The id attribute must respect the W3C Recommendation (in particular be unique in the page). See http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-html40/struct/global.html#adef-id for more information.

If no id is specified, the id will be randomly generated.

Parameters:
id - the id to set to the button.

setRelief

public final void setRelief(UIButtonRelief aRelief)
Set the relief of the button.

Default is UIButtonRelief.EMBOSSED.

Parameters:
aRelief - a UIButtonRelief to apply to this button.
Since:
5.3.0

setTooltip

public final void setTooltip(UserMessage tooltip)
Sets a tooltip to the button.

If the button layout is set to UIButtonLayout.ICON_ONLY, the label will be the tooltip, thereby, the tooltip will not be used.

Parameters:
tooltip - the tooltip to set to the button.
